item.title: The Basilisk V3 Pro is Razer's most sophisticated mouse yet
item.description: Razer, a leading brand in gaming lifestyle products, has introduced the Basilisk V3 Pro, a wireless gaming mouse designed for high performance and extensive customization. The mouse boasts features like a Razer HyperScroll Tilt Wheel, Razer Optical Mouse Switches Gen-3, more than 10 programmable buttons, a Razer Focus Pro 30K Optical Sensor, and wireless charging capabilities. Chris Mitchell, the Head of Razer’s PC Gaming Division, highlighted the Basilisk V3 Pro as their most feature-packed gaming mouse yet, packed with everything needed to outperform the competition.
